init.desc:
Create sample template files
Usage: datagen init

gen.desc:
Generate data file
Usage: datagen [-i/--gen-id <genId>] [-s/--num-segments <numSegments>] [-w/--num-workers <numWorkers>] [-o/--out-file <outFile>] gen

options.desc: An ID unique to the current data generation, used by all worker processes  | defaut: datagen process PID
How many segments in a data file | default: 1
How many worker processes, each worker creates a data file | default: 1
Generated data file name, postfixed with worker ID | default: 'data'
